title: Pingu the magician
creator_credit: Otmar Gutman, Pingu Filmstudio and PINGU B V NL
brief_description: Pingu and his family and friends invite you join them in ten of their stories of fun and games. Stories on the tape include: ‘Pingu the magician’; ‘Pingu’s curling party’; ‘Pingu as an icicle player’; ‘Pingu’s outing’; ‘Pingu and the camera’; ‘Pingu’s parent’s have no time’; ‘Pingu and the packaging material’; ‘Pingu at the fairground’; ‘Pingu cannot lose’; and ‘Pingu and the disabled penguin’.
creator_credit_for_label: Otmar Gutman, Pingu Filmstudio and PINGU B V NL
